item.description:
Okay, most of the people who responded to my game night survey (http://www.surveymonk...) said that Sunday night would work for them, so this coming week we'll meet for game night on Sunday, May 30 starting at 7:30. If no one comes, then I know that you all were joshing me! Ideally, though, we'll have a few more folks for games on Sunday and we'll get some fun stuff to the table.

If you want to play something in particular, please suggest it ahead of time so that I can read the rules or otherwise prepare. (Or lobby against you!)

Hope to see you here on Sunday!

Eric
item.name: Game night in Concord, NH
